paper_abstract: We examine the parameterized complexity of the problem of editing a graph to obtain an r-degenerate graph. We show that for the editing operations vertex deletion and edge deletion, both separately and combined, the problem is W[P]-complete. and remains W[P]-complete even if the input graph is already (r + 1)-degenerate, or has maximum degree 2r + 1 for all r >= 2. We also demonstrate fixed-parameter tractability for several CLIQUE based problems when the input graph has bounded degeneracy. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: The parameterized complexity of editing graphs for bounded degeneracy
